name: Terminator
description: Terminator is a cross-platform terminal tool. It can split the interface into grids, drag and drop each terminal to sort and use each window in parallel. The  interface layout and configure preferences can be adjusted by visual interface.

en_US.description: Terminator is a cross-platform terminal tool. It can split the interface into grids, drag and drop each terminal to sort and use each window in parallel. The  interface layout and configure preferences can be adjusted by visual interface.
en_US.name: Terminator

zh_CN.description: Terminator是一款跨平台的终端工具，将界面分割成网格状，拖拽排序各个终端，并行使用各个窗口，通过可视化界面来调整界面布局和配置喜好。
zh_CN.name: Terminator
